snippet: The meeting, reported by North Korean state media, came amid signs that Pyongyang is stepping up its nuclear and long-range missile programs.
abstract: Delegation dispatched by China’s new leader Xi Jinping meets with the North Korean leader Kim Jong-un, amid signs that North Korea is stepping up its nuclear and long-range missile programs; allies pledge to bolster their ties.
lead_paragraph: The meeting, reported by North Korean state media, came amid signs that Pyongyang is stepping up its nuclear and long-range missile programs.

headline.seo: Chinese Delegation Said to Meet With Kim Jong-un in North Korea
headline.main: Chinese Delegation Said to Meet With North Korean Leader
